item.description:
Living Social has a deal for the next two days (5/2-5/4) where you can register for the Warrior Dash for $37 (instead of $75). I'm extending the opportunity to all of you should anyone care to join me.

https://www.livingsocial.com/deals/333322?ref=conf-jp&rpi=59372226

I purchased the deal but I haven't registered yet for the Warrior Dash because I have to wait a day. As for slot times, there's presently a lot of spaces, and I'm thinking of going in the morning say around 11 am, but I'm open for discussion.

Let me know if you are interested in camping as well.

More information is outlined below.

**********************************

http://warriordash.com/register2012_new_england.php

Welcome to the world's largest running series. Warrior Dash lands in New England for the second time in 2012 where 12 obstacles from hell await you along this 3.11 mile course. Are you a Warrior?

3.11 hellish miles

Waves of up to 500 participants will start at the following times (on Sunday 6/10):

9:00, 9:30, 10:00, 10:30, 11:00, 11:30, Noon, 12:30, 1:00, 1:30, 2:00, 2:30, 3:00

Transfer/Registration Guidelines:
Registration will be closed on Monday, May 28, 2012 at 11:59pm CT. Absolutely NO registrations will be accepted after this time. Request to modify any details of registration information must be submitted prior to this date. This includes wave time, date, participant information and location. Transfers may only be made to a wave that has open space available.

Note: There is a $10 transfer fee to transfer to a new event, new participant, or new event day.

Refunds:

Sorry, NO refunds under any circumstances

Camping:

Camping is available and the cost is $60. There are 126 spaces left as of 5/2. Here's what's included:

Included in Warrior Campground:

  • 20’ x 20’ camping space (tent camping)
  • Two nights; Friday, June 8 and Saturday, June 9
  • Two Warrior Dash parking passes
  • Six wristbands to access Warrior Campground
  • Additional wristbands may be purchased on site for $10.00 each
  • Outside food and drink is permitted in the Warrior Campground area
  • Outside food and beverages will not be permitted in the Warrior Dash festival area

The following items are not permitted:

  • Glass bottles
  • Kegs
  • Personal fires
  • Non-propane grills
  • Illegal drug use or underage drinking
  • All vehicles, tents and individuals are subject to search at anytime
  • We do not offer refunds. See the FAQ for more information.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll work out the details later
item.name: Warrior Dash 2012
